thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com
thread.title: Edward Costa
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Edward Costa

author: Edward Costa
title: Edward Costa
text: At time I had wished there was one point of contact though, having many different people handling my account enhanced the resources and availability of specific skills and specialty services required since my loan application was somewhat unique in ways. There were many skills required in order to overcome some challenges with my loan process. I would have preferred to be able to speak directly with the QL underwriting department. This I feel might possibly could have avoided misunderstandings, miscommunication and, confusion I experience as a result of there being so many "cooks in the kitchen". It was a very unique experience and the technology was unparalleled and still continues to amaze me. I appreciate everyone's infinite patience and dedication to seeing my loan closed no matter what the obstacles along the way. Thank you!
